Reviews.Title: It's BAD
Reviews.Author: Manuel Negrin "MRNY"
Reviews.Content: This pone is slow. very bad. Don't buy it. The Android is fake 4.2. And the RAM is 256 Mb. very poor.

Reviews.Title: bs phone
Reviews.Author: jalen
Reviews.Content: Internet sucks because its a foreign phone. It also moves very slow. Apps close on their own very disappointed person

Reviews.Title: POOR EXAMPLE OF A SMARTPHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Georgette Anderson
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS A TOTAL WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!  IT DIDN'T EVEN DESERVE 1 STAR. NO INTERNAL MEMORY ...DO NOT BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: works poorly
Reviews.Author: reevi60
Reviews.Content: This phone would not hold a charge, keep on the AT&T; network, It also kept dropping my calls. I love the size of the phone, it answers easily.However. it is not usable for me. I have it in the box it came it and bought a cheap go phone to replace it until I can upgrade my phone and may just keep the go phone for now. I can't recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: It is an excellent phone for this price for overseas use.
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Phone is exactly as described in the description (screen size, CPU and tech description); comes with a price tag that is reasonable for what it offers. It is unlocked and offers quad frequency so can be used as cell phone any where in world.For "data plans" it has 2G and EDGE that is what I felt reasonable for overseas use. Obviously it is not 3G or 4G and for that reason you don't have to go in the different frequencies issue that different networks use across world.I have reduced one star as its ROM is fairly less as one would expect these days.Overall - great for a worldwide phone and minimal internet use.

Reviews.Title: Awfule!!
Reviews.Author: Rayceem H.
Reviews.Content: I dont recommend anyone buying this phone, it has so many problems that ive been tempted to destroy it so many times!

Reviews.Title: data not work
Reviews.Author: jose valderrama
Reviews.Content: the phone works fine for making calls, it's okay to take pictures, has good presentation, but to be a smart phone does not work with the data I tested three different lines are the apn changes have commanded them to review, then updated the software and this phone does not work it is essential that the data does not send multimedia message, whatsaap not work, the google play no hunger, nor in short is not a smart phone is a simple cell.

Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: Michael C.
Reviews.Content: this phone has many problems. first it won't ;let me send or receive picture messages. then, i can't talk to anyone without my calls being dropped. this phone is really not a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Sabina Granado
Reviews.Content: Very good product, I recommend it. Excellent quality, as it says the publication. presentation is very good, the price adjusted.

Reviews.Title: service needed
Reviews.Author: Kev Johnson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone only to use in Barbados. Did not work well with pre paid services. I had to buy a service plan to avoid spotty service
